hotDishes.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
hotDishes.about: Tender beef cooked in red wine sauce with mushrooms and pearl onions. Served with garlic mashed potatoes.

hotDishes.name: Beef Wellington
hotDishes.about: Tender beef fillet wrapped in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles and foie gras.

hotDishes.name: Ratatouille
hotDishes.about: Provencal vegetable stew made with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, and herbs.

hotDishes.name: Duck Confit
hotDishes.about: Duck leg slow-cooked in its own fat until tender and served with crispy potatoes.

coldDishes.name: Charcuterie Platter
coldDishes.about: Assorted cured meats, pâté, cheese, cornichons, and crusty bread served with whole grain mustard.

coldDishes.name: Gazpacho
coldDishes.about: Chilled tomato-based soup with cucumbers, bell peppers, onions, garlic, and olive oil.

coldDishes.name: Prosciutto Wrapped Melon
coldDishes.about: Sweet melon slices wrapped in salty prosciutto slices, served chilled.

salads.name: Caprese Salad
salads.about: Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze.

salads.name: Greek Salad
salads.about: Crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese tossed in Greek vinaigrette.

salads.name: Waldorf Salad
salads.about: Crisp apples, celery, grapes, and walnuts tossed in a creamy dressing.

salads.name: Cobb Salad
salads.about: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, avocado, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese.

desserts.name: Crème Brûlée:
desserts.about: A rich custard dessert topped with a contrasting layer of caramelized sugar.

desserts.name: Tarte Tatin
desserts.about: A classic French upside-down apple tart with caramelized apples, typically

desserts.name: Chocolate Fondant
desserts.about: A warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center, often served with vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: Profiteroles with Vanilla Ice Cream
desserts.about: Light and airy choux pastry filled with vanilla ice cream, typically drizzled with chocolate sauce.

beverages.about: Creamy yogurt drink blended with ripe mangoes and a hint of cardamom.

beverages.name: Sparkling Elderflower Lemonade
beverages.about: Refreshing lemonade infused with elderflower syrup and sparkling water.

beverages.about: Rum, lime juice, mint leaves, soda water, and simple syrup served over ice.

hotDishes.name: Spicy Tandoori Chicken
hotDishes.about: Tender pieces of chicken marinated in spicy yogurt sauce and cooked in a traditional tandoor oven

hotDishes.name: Vegetable Biryani
hotDishes.about: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, herbs, and spices, layered with saffron-infused rice.

hotDishes.name: Lamb Vindaloo
hotDishes.about: Succulent lamb pieces cooked in a fiery vindaloo sauce made with vinegar, spices, and potatoes

hotDishes.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
hotDishes.about: Cubes of paneer cheese marinated in a creamy and flavorful tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices

coldDishes.name: Tandoori Shrimp Cocktail
coldDishes.about: Grilled tandoori shrimp served chilled with a spicy cocktail sauce and lemon wedges.

coldDishes.about: Creamy yogurt mixed with diced cucumbers, mint, and spices, served chilled.

salads.about: Cold noodles tossed with shredded carrots, bell peppers, green onions, and sesame soy dressing.

desserts.about: Creamy cheesecake topped with golden brown gulab jamun balls and a drizzle of rose syrup.

desserts.about: Creamy rice pudding infused with aromatic cardamom and garnished with toasted almonds.

desserts.name: Chocolate Samosa with Ice Cream
desserts.about: Crispy chocolate-filled samosas served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

beverages.name: Fresh Lime Soda
beverages.about: Sparkling soda water mixed with fresh lime juice and a touch of simple syrup.

beverages.about: Rum, lime juice, mint leaves, soda water, and simple syrup served over ice.

beverages.about: Aromatic blend of black tea, spices, and steamed milk, lightly sweetened with honey.

hotDishes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
hotDishes.about: Spicy stir-fried chicken with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers in a savory Kung Pao sauce.

hotDishes.name: Shrimp Pad Thai
hotDishes.about: Classic Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

hotDishes.name: Sichuan Eggplant
hotDishes.about: Tender pieces of eggplant stir-fried with garlic, ginger, and Sichuan peppercorns in a spicy sauce.

hotDishes.name: Beef with Broccoli
hotDishes.about: Tender slices of beef stir-fried with fresh broccoli florets in a garlic soy sauce.

coldDishes.about: Shredded chicken breast tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce with sesame paste and peanuts.

coldDishes.about: Cold noodles tossed in a spicy Sichuan sauce with shredded chicken and cucumber.

coldDishes.name: Crispy Spring Rolls
coldDishes.about: Crispy spring rolls filled with shredded vegetables and served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

salads.about: Roasted beets tossed with arugula, candied walnuts, and crumbled goat cheese. Drizzled with a balsamic reduction.

salads.about: Grilled beef slices served on a bed of mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and Thai basil. Tossed in a tangy lime dressing.

salads.about: Grilled tofu marinated in miso paste served on a bed of mixed greens, edamame beans, radishes, and sesame seeds. Tossed in a miso ginger dressing.

desserts.about: Creamy coconut milk panna cotta topped with fresh pineapple compote.

desserts.about: Silky chocolate hazelnut mousse topped with chopped hazelnuts and chocolate shavings.

desserts.about: Layers of matcha-infused sponge cake, creamy mascarpone cheese, and whipped cream.
